item.title: Untitled
item.description: Some fun, trying to break out of the mold a bit.

item.title: Real News for PBR Consideration
item.description: This is a low fidelity render of my dream project. Please do feel free to reach out to me with further questions! Thank you all again for reviewing this work.

item.title: whats necessary
item.description: This is a digital abstract piece about fashion in the city.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello world. I put together this quick blog to place an entry into the PBR Open Door contest. As I continue to create new work, I will post it here. Thank you.
